title: Application Opened
description: User launches or foregrounds your mobile app after the first open Collected Automatically!

from_background.description: If application transitioned from “Background” to “Inactive” state prior to foregrounding (as opposed to from “Not Running” state). Automatically collected on iOS only.

url.description: The value of UIApplicationLaunchOptionsURLKey from launchOptions (auto-collected on iOS only)

build.description: Build number of the installed app
